amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to collect information about individuals attending gun shows, by means of an automatic license plate reader, or to retain any information so collected.

action.text: Mr. Farr raised a point of order against the Lamborn amendment (A080). Mr. Farr stated that the amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A080) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
